item.title: Managing clients
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: The Players It’s not a secret that software engineers prefer a clean and completed specification than metting with clients. We tend to think that meetings are a waste of time and many of our colleagues are not very fond of what is called soft skills. On the other side, we have some clients that have no idea about software and want the changes in their platform now. What is all of that?
